tool_description: Validates whether specified poses or paths are within the robot's reachable workspace and identifies workspace violations.

poses.description: Array of poses to validate, each as 7 values: [x,y,z,qw,qx,qy,qz]

safety_margin.description: Safety margin from workspace boundary in meters

error_messages: Invalid pose format: Each pose must contain exactly 7 values [x,y,z,qw,qx,qy,qz].
Empty pose array: At least one pose must be provided for validation.
Invalid safety margin: Safety margin must be non-negative and less than 0.5 meters.
usage: Provide array of poses as flattened 7-element groups, robot_config, and optional safety_margin. Returns validation status for each pose.

valid_poses.description: Validation status for each input pose

violation_distances.description: Distance to workspace boundary for each pose (negative if outside)

overall_valid.description: Whether all poses are within valid workspace
